item.title: Visual network
item.description: library(visNetwork) library(widgetframe) ## Loading required package: htmlwidgets Hierarchical network example Using Font Awesome integration nodes <- data.frame(id = 1:7, group = c("A", "A", "A","B","B","B","B") ) edges <- data.frame( from = c(1,2,2,2,3,3), to = c(2,3,4,5,6,7) ) figure <- visNetwork(nodes, edges, width = "100%") %>% visGroups(groupname = "A", shape = "icon", icon = list(code = "f0c0", size = 75)) %>% visGroups(groupname = "B", shape = "icon", icon = list(code = "f007", color = "red")) %>% visEdges(arrows = "from") %>% visHierarchicalLayout() %>% addFontAwesome() htmlwidgets::saveWidget(figure, file = "figure.
